column5: Thanks again Dave for the great price you gave me on the pin Wednesday at the show,just thought I would let you know I HAD to try er out this morning and landed my first fish on the pin with a nice 4.5 pound bow and giving it a go tomorrow morning as well. Pictures are coming  Hawk
HEy  Your welcome,  did you go to the spot I told you about.   Was it as good as the reports that I got...   Its always cool to catch steel on a pin.  way to go.  See you on the river  Dave
Dave..... you and HAVE TO TALK! LOL   Your in the High Park area.... dang.. I am there all the time... my SIL has a place there..... Damnit!   G
GERRITT  ANY tine bud.  you have my number and lets get together and do some fishing  Dave

heres pictures at a second glance i'd say the fish was under 4 any guesses?  http://i224.photobucket.com/albums/dd148/c...11/SSPX0008.jpg  same fish http://i224.photobucket.com/albums/dd148/c...11/SSPX0007.jpg  here is a fish a buddy of mine got over the christmas holidays on a lake erie trib just thought i'd share http://i224.photobucket.com/albums/dd148/c...11/SSPX0010.jpg   Hawk

I was at the Sportsman Show on Wednesday and made a point of looking for Dave at his booth and introducing myself. We had a long chat and even made plans to share a boat for a few muskies this summer.
Dave has been a great help to me as well. He knows his stuff and steered me in the right direction with my float setup. YOU DA MAN DAVE!!!

can't agree more Dave...Lew I think I seen you there....sorry I didn't introduce myself I jus would have felt awkward if it wasn't you....oh well next time I'll know....Dave another good day today I'll pm you info...
